creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
Unless someone can come up with a real dern good reason why hpsf needs its own
LittleEndian class, we should convert it to use the
org.apache.poi.util.LittleEndian for 2.0

creator: rainer.klute@epost.de
text: Will look at it when time permits. This is not an urgent one.

Provided solution does not work. I suggest to roll back the changes and stick
with a properly functioning HPSF version for the time being. After that, a
properly functioning fix should be provided.
creator: rainer.klute@epost.de
poi-support@buni.org
text:
negative.  Move forward not backwards.  This code needs its papa or needs to
move to the scratchpad to reflect its immaturity.
